name: R5-ResearchStudyStatus-R4-ResearchStudyStatus
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 ResearchStudyStatus into FHIR R4

target.comment: R5 `active` is assumed equivalent to R4 `active` (no map, but codes match)

element.display: The study is ongoing, and participants are receiving an intervention or being examined, but potential participants are not currently being recruited or enrolled.
Study is completed prematurely and will not resume; patients are no longer examined nor treated.

target.display: Study is completed prematurely and will not resume; patients are no longer examined nor treated.
target.comment: R5 `administratively-completed` is assumed equivalent to R4 `administratively-completed` (no map, but codes match)

element.display: Protocol is approved by the review board.

target.display: Protocol is approved by the review board.
target.comment: R5 `approved` is assumed equivalent to R4 `approved` (no map, but codes match)

element.display: Study is closed for accrual; patients can be examined and treated.

target.display: Study is closed for accrual; patients can be examined and treated.
target.comment: R5 `closed-to-accrual` is assumed equivalent to R4 `closed-to-accrual` (no map, but codes match)

element.display: Study is closed to accrual and intervention, i.e. the study is closed to enrollment, all study subjects have completed treatment or intervention but are still being followed according to the primary objective of the study.

target.display: Study is closed to accrual and intervention, i.e. the study is closed to enrollment, all study subjects have completed treatment or intervention but are still being followed according to the primary objective of the study.
target.comment: R5 `closed-to-accrual-and-intervention` is assumed equivalent to R4 `closed-to-accrual-and-intervention` (no map, but codes match)

element.display: The study closed according to the study plan. There will be no further treatments, interventions or data collection.

target.display:
Study is closed to accrual and intervention, i.e. the study is closed to enrollment, all study subjects have completed treatment
or intervention but are still being followed according to the primary objective of the study.
target.comment: R5 `completed` is assumed equivalent to R4 `completed` (no map, but codes match)

element.display: Protocol was disapproved by the review board.

target.display: Protocol was disapproved by the review board.
target.comment: R5 `disapproved` is assumed equivalent to R4 `disapproved` (no map, but codes match)

element.display: The study is selecting its participants from a population, or group of people, decided on by the researchers in advance. These studies are not open to everyone who meets the eligibility criteria but only to people in that particular population, who are specifically invited to participate.
Protocol is submitted to the review board for approval.

target.display: Protocol is submitted to the review board for approval.
target.comment: R5 `in-review` is assumed equivalent to R4 `in-review` (no map, but codes match)

element.display: The study has not started recruiting participants.
Used for documenting the start and end of the overall study, distinct from progress states.
The study is currently recruiting participants.
Study is temporarily closed for accrual; can be potentially resumed in the future; patients can be examined and treated.

target.display: Study is temporarily closed for accrual; can be potentially resumed in the future; patients can be examined and treated.
target.comment: R5 `temporarily-closed-to-accrual` is assumed equivalent to R4 `temporarily-closed-to-accrual` (no map, but codes match)

element.display: Study is temporarily closed for accrual and intervention and potentially can be resumed in the future.

target.display: Study is temporarily closed for accrual and intervention and potentially can be resumed in the future.
target.comment: R5 `temporarily-closed-to-accrual-and-intervention` is assumed equivalent to R4 `temporarily-closed-to-accrual-and-intervention` (no map, but codes match)

element.display: The study has stopped early and will not start again. Participants are no longer being examined or treated.
Protocol was withdrawn by the lead organization.

target.display: Protocol was withdrawn by the lead organization.
target.comment: R5 `withdrawn` is assumed equivalent to R4 `withdrawn` (no map, but codes match)
